Description: AWS CloudFormation Sample Template: Creates a Hyrax stack using a single EC2 instance. This template demonstrates using the UserData to install the packages and files necessary to deploy Hyrax at instance launch time. **WARNING** This template creates an Amazon EC2 instance. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash -xe
yum update -y
yum install mc -y
yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 -y
yum install tomcat -y
curl -s -o bes.rpm http://s3.amazonaws.com/opendap.travis.build/bes-3.20.4-1.static.el7.x86_64.rpm
curl -s -o libdap.rpm http://s3.amazonaws.com/opendap.travis.build/libdap-3.20.3-1.el7.x86_64.rpm
yum install libdap.rpm -y
yum install bes.rpm -y
rm -f libdap.rpm
rm -f bes.rpm
service besd start
curl -s -o olfs.tgz https://www.opendap.org/pub/olfs/olfs-1.18.4-webapp.tgz
tar -xvf olfs.tgz --strip-components=1 --directory /var/lib/tomcat/webapps
rm -f olfs.tgz
service tomcat start

WebsiteURL.Description: URL for newly created Hyrax stack
